§ 9001. Definitions In this title— 11 See References in Text note below.(1) the terms “Administration” and “Administrator” mean the Small Business Administration and the Administrator thereof, respectively; and
(2) the term “small business concern” has the meaning given the term in section 632 of this title.
(Pub. L. 116–136, div. A, title I, § 1101, Mar. 27, 2020, 134 Stat. 286.)
